author: Suryatapa Bhattacharya
title: Cheers! Coca-Cola Launches Its First Alcoholic Drink
text:
FUKUOKA, Japan—A fizzy lemon-flavored alcoholic drink that goes on sale in Japan on Monday will mark Coca-Cola Co.’s first fling at selling alcohol in its 132-year history.
At a sampling event in the city, hundreds of people lined up for a taste, including some who didn’t expect to find the American company experimenting with Japanese-style booze.
...
